    A

    AppAction - Class in com.gr15.pacman.controller
    A utility class that defines common application-level actions used across controllers.

    C

    com.gr15.pacman.controller - module com.gr15.pacman.controller
     
    com.gr15.pacman.controller - package com.gr15.pacman.controller
     
    com.gr15.pacman.controller.screen - package com.gr15.pacman.controller.screen
     
    createHandler(Runnable) - Static method in class com.gr15.pacman.controller.HandlerFactory
    Creates an EventHandler for ActionEvent that simply runs the given action.
    createHandler(Supplier<T>, Consumer<T>) - Static method in class com.gr15.pacman.controller.HandlerFactory
    Creates an EventHandler for ActionEvent that uses a supplier to get input, and then passes it to a Consumer action.
    createKeyHandler(Map<KeyCode, Runnable>) - Static method in class com.gr15.pacman.controller.HandlerFactory
    Creates an EventHandler for KeyEvent that looks up a Runnable from the provided map based on the pressed KeyCode, and runs it if found.
    createKeyHandler(KeyCode, Runnable) - Static method in class com.gr15.pacman.controller.HandlerFactory
    Creates an EventHandler for KeyEvent that triggers the given action only when the specified KeyCode is pressed.
    createKeyHandler(KeyCode, Supplier<T>, Consumer<T>) - Static method in class com.gr15.pacman.controller.HandlerFactory
    Creates an EventHandler for KeyEvent that uses a supplier to get input, and passes it to a consumer action only when the specified KeyCode is pressed.

    G

    GAME_OVER - Static variable in class com.gr15.pacman.controller.AppAction
    Action to switch to game over view.
    GameApp - Class in com.gr15.pacman.controller
    The GameApp class is the entry point of the Pac-Man application.
    GameApp() - Constructor for class com.gr15.pacman.controller.GameApp
     
    GameController - Class in com.gr15.pacman.controller.screen
    The GameController class manages the core game loop, user input handling, and interaction between the game state and the view.
    GameController(GameState, GameView) - Constructor for class com.gr15.pacman.controller.screen.GameController
    Constructs a new GameController with the specified game state, game view, and view manager.
    GameOverController - Class in com.gr15.pacman.controller.screen
    The GameOverController handles interactions on the main menu screen.
    GameOverController(GameOverView, GameController) - Constructor for class com.gr15.pacman.controller.screen.GameOverController
    Constructs a new GameOverController with the given gameOverView.

    N

    P

    Action to switch to pause view.
    PauseController - Class in com.gr15.pacman.controller.screen

    Constructs a new PauseController with the specified view and game controller.
    PLAY_AGAIN - Static variable in class com.gr15.pacman.controller.AppAction
    Action to reset the current game and start it again from the beginning.

    Q

    QUIT - Static variable in class com.gr15.pacman.controller.AppAction
    Action to immediately quit the application.

    R

    resetGame() - Method in class com.gr15.pacman.controller.screen.GameController
    Resets game to initial state.
    RESUME - Static variable in class com.gr15.pacman.controller.AppAction
    Action to resume a paused game by showing the game view and starting the game loop.

    S

    start(Stage) - Method in class com.gr15.pacman.controller.GameApp
    Starts the JavaFX application and initializes the primary stage.
    startGameLoop() - Method in class com.gr15.pacman.controller.screen.GameController
    Starts the game loop, beginning the update and render cycle.
    stopGameLoop() - Method in class com.gr15.pacman.controller.screen.GameController
    Stops the game loop.
